# ARConfiguration.SceneReconstruction

**Structure**

Options that enable ARKit to detect the shape of the physical environment.

## Declaration

```swift
struct SceneReconstruction
```

## Overview

When you set one of the these values onto a world-tracking configuration’s [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARWorldTrackingConfiguration/sceneReconstruction] property, ARKit provides you with a mesh that models the real-world surrounding the user.

## Modeling the Environment

- **init(rawValue:)**: Initializes a scene-reconstruction object.
- **mesh**: A polygonal mesh approximation of the physical environment.
- **meshWithClassification**: An approximate shape of the physical environment, including classification of the real-world objects within it.
